sources.title: 2010 - The River Why - One man's struggle to catch his dreams.
sources.description: Gus leaves the city to live and fish in the wilderness and begins a search for self-discovery. During his quest he embraces his love of the wilderness and finds romance with a beautiful woman.

metadata.Plot: A young man abandons his family for a solitary life of fly-fishing. His goal was to find his own way in the fishing world and thereby find himself and love.
metadata.Writer: Thomas A. Cohen, David James Duncan, John Jay Osborn Jr.
metadata.Actors: Zach Gilford, Amber Heard, William Hurt
